Actions.Name: Cull
Actions.Description: Deal 3 damage, once to an adjacent foe for each of the following that is true:

Actions.Name: Grapple
Actions.Description: The [name] marks an adjacent foe. While marked, that foe must save if it attempts to break adjacency. On a failed save, it becomes unable to exit adjacency with the [name] by any means for the rest of the current turn. On a successful save, the mark and this effect ends, but the foe is weakened.
